column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque actually catered our wedding back in November. While we had our own helpers to serve the food
column2: the catering staff was very thorough and easy to communicate with and the food was dropped off with chafing dishes
column3: etc on time. The cost was very reasonable for 215 people! We ended up ordering brisket
column6: and salad. Â People really loved it. Even a few months later
column7: we still get many compliments of using Smoque as our caterer. Would definitely recommend!!
